comments.comments_text: Wonderful finish from Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain (Liverpool). He drills a low shot precisely into the bottom left corner. No chance for the goalkeeper.

comments.comments_text: Goal! A great through ball by Jordan Henderson sets up Mohamed Salah (Liverpool) inside the box, and he makes no mistake and bangs the ball low into the middle of the goal. 3:0.

comments.comments_text: The corner by James Ward-Prowse (Southampton) lacks accuracy as it's hit with too much power. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Liverpool.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Jack Stephens (Southampton) was quite harsh and Kevin Friend didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
